Attack¶

Modules

class torchattacks.attack.Attack(name, model)[source]¶

Base class for all attacks.

Note

It will automatically set device to the device where given model is. Also, it will only change the original model’s training mode to test with .eval() when attacking, and will return to the original training mode after attack is over.

forward(*input)[source]¶

It defines the computation performed at every call. Should be overridden by all subclasses.

save(file_name, data_loader, accuracy=True)[source]¶

Save adversarial images as torch.tensor from data_loader.

Parameters:
  • file_name (str) – save path.
  • data_loader (torch.utils.data.DataLoader) – original images and labels.
  • accuracy (bool) – If you don’t want to know about accuaracy of the model during save process, set accuracy as False. (DEFAULT : True)
set_mode(mode)[source]¶

Determine whether the attack return adversarial images as int or float.

Parameters:mode (str) – ‘float’ or ‘int’. (DEFAULT : ‘float’)
